TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHierarchyData

summary.span: 公開階層式資料結構的節點，包括節點物件和描述節點特性的部分屬性。

span.span: Exposes a node of a hierarchical data structure, including the node object and some properties that describe characteristics of the node.

summary.span: 實作 介面的物件可以包含在 集合中，供 ASP.NET 網站巡覽和資料來源控制項使用。

span.span: Objects that implement the interface can be contained in collections, and are used by ASP.NET site navigation and data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表階層結構中的節點，並追蹤到其父系和子系節點的階層式關聯性的類別會實作介面。The interface is implemented by classes that represent nodes of a hierarchical structure, and track the hierarchical relationships to their parent and child nodes. 類別實作介面中實作的集合可包含介面。Classes that implement the interface can be contained in collections that implement the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作介面的類別，包裝物件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the interface with a class that wraps a object. 類別也很清楚的階層式資料節點，其中介面代表 ASP.NET 階層式資料來源控制項。The class is a good example of a hierarchical data node, which the interface represents for ASP.NET hierarchical data source controls. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#5)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以遞迴方式逐一查看集合中，擷取來自列舉值使用的項目方法，並執行基本工作，與資料的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to recursively iterate through an collection, extract the item from the enumerator using the method, and perform basic work with the data item. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetChildren() cil managed

summary.span: 取得列舉物件，表示目前階層式節點的所有子節點。

span.span: Gets an enumeration object that represents all the child nodes of the current hierarchical node.

returns.span: 集合，包含目前階層式節點的子節點。

span.span: An collection of child nodes of the current hierarchical node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來判斷是否節點有子節點。You can use the property to determine whether the node has child nodes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查屬性來判斷目前的階層式資料節點是否有子節點，並將其擷取使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to check the property to determine whether the current hierarchical data node has child nodes, and retrieve them using the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData GetParent() cil managed

summary.span: 取得 物件，表示目前階層式節點的父節點。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the parent node of the current hierarchical node.

returns.span: 物件，表示目前階層式節點的父節點。

span.span: An object that represents the parent node of the current hierarchical node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面不會定義 HasParent 方便的屬性，因此呼叫者必須檢查傳回的值方法`null`來判斷是否目前節點是階層式資料的根節點節點所屬的結構。The interface does not define a HasParent convenience property, so callers must check the return value of the method for `null` to determine whether the current node is the root node of the hierarchical data structure to which the node belongs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法中實作的類別介面。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the interface. `FileSystemHierarchyData`類別會包裝物件，而方法實作會檢查的型別物件，並傳回適當的父物件根據型別。The `FileSystemHierarchyData` class wraps a object, and the method implementation checks the type of the object, and returns the appropriate parent object based on the type. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面和類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface and the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasChildren As Boolean
public: property bool HasChildren { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指出 物件所表示的階層式資料節點是否有任何子節點。

span.span: Indicates whether the hierarchical data node that the object represents has any child nodes.

value.span: 如果目前節點有子節點，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current node has child nodes; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是方便的屬性，可讓呼叫端，以避免檢查的傳回值方法`null`。The property is a convenience property that enables callers to avoid checking the return value of the method for `null`. 如果屬性會傳回`true`，呼叫方法來擷取子節點的集合。If the property returns `true`, call the method to retrieve an collection of child nodes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 ASP.NET 階層式資料繫結控制項遞迴資料繫結方法中的物件。The following code example demonstrates how an ASP.NET hierarchical data-bound control uses an object in a recursive data-binding method. 中的項目集合會列舉，和每物件會使用擷取方法。The items in an collection are enumerated, and for each an object is retrieved using the method. 最後，屬性會檢查以判斷是否遞迴。Finally, the property is checked to determine whether to recurse. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Item { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 物件所表示的階層式資料節點。

span.span: Gets the hierarchical data node that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然許多類別，代表階層式資料節點，例如類別，請實作直接介面中，其他類別只會當做未實作介面之類別的包裝函式。While many classes that represent hierarchical data nodes, such as the class, implement the interface directly, other classes only act as a wrapper for a class that does not implement the interface. 在功能上相當於商務物件時，提供這些設計的情況下的屬性，是物件，但無法輕鬆地重新設計。The property is provided for these design situations, when business objects are functionally equivalent to an object but cannot be redesigned easily. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性，檢查的型別物件使用屬性，並轉換要執行更多的型別特定作業的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to access properties, check the type of an object using the property, and cast the object to perform more type-specific operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得節點的階層式路徑。

span.span: Gets the hierarchical path of the node.

value.span: ，識別相對於目前節點的階層式路徑。

span.span: A that identifies the hierarchical path relative to the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以傳遞至方法來擷取物件，對應至所識別的節點。The property can be passed to the method to retrieve the object that corresponds to the node identified by . > [!CAUTION] > 屬性不應該包含任何主機環境的機密資訊，因為它可能會呈現給用戶端資料繫結控制項中。The property should not contain any sensitive information about the host environment, because it might be rendered to the client in a data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作中實作的類別屬性介面。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the interface. `FileSystemHierarchyData`類別會包裝物件，而屬性的實作會傳回其檔案系統路徑。The `FileSystemHierarchyData` class wraps a object, and the property implementation returns its file system path. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面和類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface and the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Type As String
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含在 屬性中 的型別。

span.span: Gets the name of the type of contained in the property.

value.span: 物件所表示之物件的型別名稱。

span.span: The name of the type of object that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會傳回中所表示之物件物件。The property does not return the of the object represented in an object. 它會傳回資料繫結控制項用來區分階層架構中有不同的可繫結屬性的項目之間的名稱。It returns a name used by data-bound controls to differentiate between items in a hierarchy that have different bindable properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫基本屬性，以串流處理，則檢查的型別物件使用屬性和轉換要執行更多的型別特定作業的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to write the basic properties to an stream, then check the type of an object using the property and cast the object to perform more type-specific operations. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/CS/ihd_1.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData_1/VB/ihd_1.aspx.vb#2)]
